articles.title: India bowling coach breaks silence on 'dropping' Shami in Asia Cup - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Mohammed Shami has played only one match in Asia Cup, where he filled in for Jasprit Bumrah who was forced to miss the game due to personal reasons. | Cricket
